cuteBot: Functions to Cutebot by ELECFREAKS Co.,Ltd.
cuteBot.MotorsList: Select the motor on the left or right
cuteBot.RGBLights: Select the RGBLights on the left or right
cuteBot.ServoList: Select the servo on the S1 or S2
cuteBot.backforward: TODO: full speed move back,speed is -100.
cuteBot.forward: TODO: full speed move forward,speed is 100.
cuteBot.motors: TODO: Set the speed of left and right wheels.
cuteBot.moveTime: TODO: Full speed operation lasts for 10 seconds,speed is 100.
cuteBot.setServo: TODO: Set the angle of servo.
cuteBot.singleheadlights: TODO: Select a headlights and set the RGB color.
cuteBot.trackEvent: TODO: Runs when line sensor finds or loses.
cuteBot.tracking: Judging the Current Status of Tracking Module.
cuteBot.tracking|param|state: Four states of tracking module, eg: TrackingState.L_R_line
cuteBot.ultrasonic: Cars can extend the ultrasonic function to prevent collisions and other functions..
